body:
I seem to discover the cause of the error, today.

``` ruby
# sprockets-2.0.0/lib/sprockets/base.rb
113     def each_file
114       return to_enum(__method__) unless block_given?
115       paths.each do |base_path|
116         Dir["#{base_path}/**/*"].each do |filename|
117 $stderr.puts "#{filename} #{filename.encoding}" #added
118 filename = filename.force_encoding('utf-8')          #added for test
119           yield filename unless File.directory?(filename)
120         end
121       end
122       nil
123     end
```
Dir[]method return UTF-8 string on 1.9.2-p180, if utf-8 filename is treated.
But, Dir[]method return ASCII-8BIT string on 1.9.3-preview1
